page.shortlink: tabbed ui properties tabbed ui properties initial state of buttons pane property
page.description: Specify the initial state of the Buttons pane.
page.discussion: 'Open' - button pane is shown, 'Closed' - button pane is not shown, but the user can click the expand button to show the button pane, 'Closed-locked' - button pane is not shown - the button pane can only be shown programmatically using this Javascript command:
